tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TournamentSchedule (
    tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_date DATE,
    end_time TIME,
    participating_teams JSON
)

CREATE TABLE TournamentSchedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    team_1 VARCHAR(50),
    team_2 VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    team1_id INT,
    team2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES schedule(schedule_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team1_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team2_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tournament_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  team_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT,
  team_id1 INT,
  team_id2 INT,
  venue VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  match_id INT,
  winning_team_id INT,
  losing_team_id INT,
  score VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE tournaments (tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_id INT,
    time_id INT,
    team_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (date_id) REFERENCES tournament_dates(date_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (time_id) REFERENCES tournament_times(time_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id)
)

CREATE TABLE schedules (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    venue VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (tournament_id) REFERENCES tournaments(tournament_id)
)
